text: Main academic building of school. B. T. Road Government Sponsored Higher Secondary School is a senior secondary boys' school in Kolkata district of West Bengal, India. ==History== It was established in 1962 at "CIT campus" in Cossipore opposite Rabindra Bharati University. This institution is famous in name "CIT School". ==Courses== Higher secondary section of this school offers Arts and Science streams. ==Notable alumni== * Aritra Dutta Banik, actor ==See also== * List of schools in Kolkata ==References== ==External links== * B. T. Road Government Sponsored H. S. title: B. T. Road Government Sponsored H. S. School
